title: Yara's Duelist Academy
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Yara%27s_Duelist_Academy\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

**Yara's Duelist Academy** is a [wizlab](/Wizlab "Wizlab") that features many different species of mages, as well as lots of anti-magic: virtually everything here carries some form of [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic") weapon or ability, and unlike the player, monsters aren't penalized by wielding antimagic. At the end waits the Head Instructor.

Other than the antimagic weapons, many [spellbooks](/Spellbooks "Spellbooks"), especailly those with [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes"), will be found. There is a chance to find the epitome of mage-killer weaponry, [Spellbinder](/Spellbinder "Spellbinder"), here.

## Contents

- [1 Monsters](#Monsters)
  - [1.1 Head Instructor](#Head_Instructor)
- [2 Map](#Map)
- [3 History](#History)

### Head Instructor

|   |                                                                                                        |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A powerful warrior-mage who instructs aspiring students in physical, magical, and anti-magical combat. |

[![Head Instructor.png](/images/b/be/Head_Instructor.png)](/File:Head_Instructor.png) The **Head Instructor** is a [deep elf blademaster](/Deep_elf_blademaster "Deep elf blademaster") that dual-wields 2 [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic")-branded [triple swords](/Triple_sword "Triple sword"). Its name will be randomized.

**Spells**

- [Summon Mana Viper](/Summon_Mana_Viper "Summon Mana Viper")
- [Dimension Anchor](/Dimension_Anchor "Dimension Anchor")
- [Blink Close](/Blink_Close "Blink Close")
- [Bolt of Devastation](/Bolt_of_Devastation "Bolt of Devastation") (3d20)

## History

- Yara's Duelist Academy was introduced in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
html:
Yara's Duelist Academy

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.

Yara's Duelist Academy is a wizlab that features many different species of mages, as well as lots of anti-magic: virtually everything here carries some form of antimagic weapon or ability, and unlike the player, monsters aren't penalized by wielding antimagic. At the end waits the Head Instructor.

Other than the antimagic weapons, many spellbooks, especailly those with Hexes, will be found. There is a chance to find the epitome of mage-killer weaponry, Spellbinder, here.

Contents

  • 1 Monsters
    • 1.1 Head Instructor
  • 2 Map
  • 3 History

Monsters

S Mana viper Q Tengu conjurer O Ogre mage e Deep elf knight
p Arcanist N Naga mage N Salamander mystic V Vampire mage
V Vampire knight D Quicksilver dragon i Spriggan air mage p Hell knight
p Occultist p Necromancer q Draconian knight

Head Instructor

A powerful warrior-mage who instructs aspiring students in physical, magical, and anti-magical combat.

The Head Instructor is a deep elf blademaster that dual-wields 2 antimagic-branded triple swords. Its name will be randomized.

Spells

  • Summon Mana Viper
  • Dimension Anchor
  • Blink Close
  • Bolt of Devastation (3d20)
